          • getDefaultValue

            public java.lang.String getDefaultValue()
            Specified by:
            getDefaultValue in interface javax.jdo.metadata.ColumnMetadata
            Returns:
            String Column default value

          • setDefaultValue

            public javax.jdo.metadata.ColumnMetadata setDefaultValue(java.lang.String oDefValue)

            Set column default value.

            Pass one of the following options on oDefValue parameter:
            • GUID: Set the column value by calling com.knowgate.stringutils.Uid.createUniqueKey() or another global unique key generator defined by the implementation.
            • SERIAL: Set the column value by getting next value of a Sequence provided by the implementation.
            • NOW: Set the column value to a Timestamp which date is taken from system time.
            • $column_name: Transliterate the value of another column by calling com.knowgate.stringutils.Slugs.transliterate() or another normalizer defined by the implementation.
            • 'string literal': Set the column value to the string literal value inside the single quotes.
            • column_name_or_literal+another_column_name_or_literal: Concatenate the given values of columns or literals.
            Specified by:
            setDefaultValue in interface javax.jdo.metadata.ColumnMetadata
            Parameters:
            oDefValue - String Column default value

          • getInsertValue

          • getConstraint

            public java.lang.String getConstraint()
            Returns:
            String If getTarget() is not null return "foreign key " concatenated with the name of the table referenced. Else if a pattern constraint is set return the string representation of the pattern.

          • check

            public boolean check(java.lang.Object sValue)

            Check if a column value matches the pattern set for the column.

            For boolean, any numeric, date and timestamp types check that the class of the value matches the SQL type assigned in the metadata.
            Parameters:
            sValue - Object
            Returns:
            boolean

          • toJdoXml

            public java.lang.String toJdoXml()
            Returns:
            String like <column name="Column_Name" jdbc-type="TYPE_NAME" length="99" scale="9" allows-null="true" target="Referenced_Table_Name" />

          • toDdlXml

            public java.lang.String toDdlXml()
            Returns:
            String like <column name="Column_Name" primaryKey="false" required="false" type="YPE_NAME" size="99,9" autoIncrement="false" />

            public static int getDefaultPrecision(int columnType)

            Get column default precision in bytes

            BIT1

            VARCHAR255
            VARBINARY255

            NVARCHAR127
            LONGNVARCHAR1073741822
            LONGVARCHAR2147483647

            BLOB2147483647
            LONGVARBINARY2147483647
